topic.title: EMS Current Medication Section - conformance rules

lines.i: Information regarding a patient's current medications

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.15"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67844-1" EMS current medications Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10955)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Current Medications Section" (CONF:10219)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10958)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Currently On Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.75)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10960)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient On Anticoagulants (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.76)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..*] entry (CONF:10962)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Current Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.77)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67844-1" EMS current medications Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10955)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Current Medications Section" (CONF:10219)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10958)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Currently On Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.75)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10960)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient On Anticoagulants (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.76)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..*] entry (CONF:10962)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Current Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.77)
